pr_body: Fixes #586 ### Added Scrollbars for the following Screens: - Offline Files Screen. - Recent Files Screen. - Server Apps Screen. - All Screens Associated with Server Files. ### Features of Scrollbar: - The scrollbar is not static/fixed. It fades away if not used for a few seconds. - The scrollbar will only appear if items exceed the screen size as of to improve user's ease of access. - The length of scrollbar is not fixed and varies according to the items present at the folder. - The scrollbar is a component of AndroidX and no 3rd party library is used which increases the compatibility of the component in the app. - No Drawables are used, it is only an additional tag of the implemented RecyclerView. This completely abolishes any kind of Gradle Linkage errors/issues. ### Demo without Scrollbar: ### Demo with Scrollbar - Light Theme: ### Demo with Scrollbar - Dark Theme:
